Name: Summer Memory of Bell
About the game: This is a Galgame about pure love which takes place in the summer, produced by Galgame Department of Jinan University's unnamed cartoon club in 2015 and re-optimized three years later. Story Introduction A teenager trapped in the memories of past meets a disoriented girl who has lost her memories. What could they change, and what could they save? Where would the fate lead them? Their story starts from here. Characters Introduction Bell A young girl with cat ears and tail who has been saved by the protagonist after fainting. Lives in protagonist's house because of amnesia with unknown cause. Naturally, she's curious about everything around her, so she causes trouble often. Loves canned fish, like to stick to protagonist, relies on protagonist heavily, but also hopes to help him. Gao Yaoyuan The protagonist's neighbor and also a police officer in the town police station. Very friendly to people, likes to joke, can lose control if sees something she likes, likes to trick close people. She has a keen intuition and is very concerned and caring about protagonist. Her age is secret. Game Features Unique and healing story 20+ original BGM Vocal singing OP and ED Fully voiced main characters Multiple endings
